summary: A Standalone male nord follower. Good at 1-Handed Swords on one hand and magic on the other hand. Good at Thunder Magics. By RenSenninMV.
descriptionHtml:
[b] Hey guys! :D before anything else, this is my first mod and I apologize if there are any bugs. Please feel free to comment if you have any bugs, I will try my best to fix them! if you like it, please endorse! It would really help me make more mods in the future. [/b]

[line]

[b] DESCRIPTION [/b]

Hmm... Well to be honest, I've seen a lot of female followers with awesome hair, and the majority of male followers with awesome hair... yeahhhhhh it's not that much. So I've decided to create one! Well actually this is my character with different colored hair.

[b] BACKSTORY AND LOCATION [/b]

He used to be a Stormcloak Commander, but then he took an-- OK wtf no way. He quit his position to be a local Guild Master. He is staying at the Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn, "Why?" you ask? well it's just because putting NPCs at whiterun is too mainstream LOL.

[b] REQUIREMENTS [/b]

Apachii SkyHair (Link on Credits)

[b] KNOWN ISSUES [/b]

- Slight neck seam

[b] FUTURE UPDATES [/b]

- Custom voice acting
- Custom armor
- Mini quest
- Removed requirements

[b] CREDITS [/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] Apachii SkyHair by Apachii [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2577/?] Thieves Guild Major Retex by Valstein0 [/url]

[b] SPECIAL THANKS [/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5293066/?] LeonhartBenk [/url] because he was the one who has been encouraging me on modding.
author: RenSenninMV
